unnormalised: **Solar Rooftop Subsidies: Go Solar, Save Big, says MNRE!**
normalised: solar rooftop subsidies: go solar, save big, says M N R E!

unnormalised: Thinking of going solar, folks? Now's the time! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) just announced beefed-up subsidies for rooftop solar installations across India. Forget those sky-high electricity bills, especially during those scorching Delhi summers!
normalised: thinking of going solar, folks? now's the time! the ministry of new and renewable energy (M N R E) just announced beefed-up subsidies for rooftop solar installations across India. forget those sky-high electricity bills, especially during those scorching Delhi summers!

unnormalised: Under the revamped scheme, homeowners in cities like Mumbai and Chennai can get significant discounts. We're talking serious savings on installations up to 3 kW. Plus, hassle-free loan options are available via major banks like SBI.
normalised: under the revamped scheme, homeowners in cities like Mumbai and Chennai can get significant discounts. we're talking serious savings on installations up to three kilowatt. plus, hassle-free loan options are available via major banks like S B I.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from IIT-Bombay says this could be a game-changer, making solar power accessible to even more families. Imagine generating your own power on that 1000 sq ft terrace and saving Rs. 20,000 annually!
normalised: doctor Sharma from I I T-Bombay says this could be a game-changer, making solar power accessible to even more families. imagine generating your own power on that one thousand square feet terrace and saving rupee twenty thousand annually!

unnormalised: Local vendor, "Sunshine Solutions," confirms they're seeing a surge in inquiries. Don't wait for Diwali to light up; power your home with the sun! Applications are online, so get cracking before the subsidy kitty runs dry. After all, bijli bachao, desh bachao!
normalised: local vendor, "sunshine solutions," confirms they're seeing a surge in inquiries. don't wait for Diwali to light up; power your home with the sun! applications are online, so get cracking before the subsidy kitty runs dry. after all, bijli bachao, desh bachao!
